https://tmrev.io/movie/87793-A Trap for Lonely Man 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aU3qXC8mJPJ0pGgHeSLl7aNmmDt.jpg Daniel Corban reports his wife Elizabeth missing to the police. A priest arrives and says he has found her. When he brings her in, Corban insists she is not his wife. When several other people arrive and verify she is Elizabeth, Daniel feel's he is loosing the grip on reality. A Trap for Lonely Man
